text1: The list on this screen shows two types of data from your Google dataset: activities and locations. Depending on the data available this is shown in the format of date, time, and address - or occasionally without the time.
text2: Average users pick up their digital devices first thing every morning. Therefore the Google Importer checked and matched your activities and locations that appeared between 5 and 10 AM every day throughout your dataset.
text3: We are aware that anyone's sleep patterns might be different, and will try to offer personalized filtering in a future release.
